name: RequestBuilder_buildPublicRequestTest
description: Unit tests for the buildPublicRequest method in the RequestBuilder class, covering various HTTP methods and error scenarios.

test_cases.name: testBuildPublicRequestPost
test_cases.description: Tests the buildPublicRequest method with POST HTTP method.

test_cases.name: testBuildPublicRequestGet
test_cases.description: Tests the buildPublicRequest method with GET HTTP method.

test_cases.name: testBuildPublicRequestPut
test_cases.description: Tests the buildPublicRequest method with PUT HTTP method.

test_cases.name: testBuildPublicRequestDelete
test_cases.description: Tests the buildPublicRequest method with DELETE HTTP method.

test_cases.name: testBuildPublicRequestInvalidMethod
test_cases.description: Tests the buildPublicRequest method with an invalid HTTP method, expecting a BinanceConnectorException.

test_cases.name: testBuildPublicRequestInvalidUrl
test_cases.description: Tests the buildPublicRequest method with an invalid URL, expecting a BinanceConnectorException.
